__inputs.name: VAR_ADHOC_QUERY_FILTER
__inputs.label: adhoc_query_filter
__inputs.value: SELECT database, table, name, type FROM system.columns WHERE table='flows_raw' ORDER BY database, table

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT count()
FROM $table
WHERE 1
  $conditionalTest(AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6($sampler), $sampler)
  $conditionalTest(AND SrcAddr = toIPv6('$srcIP'), $srcIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND DstAddr = toIPv6('$dstIP'), $dstIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND NextHop = toIPv6('$nextHop'), $nextHop)
  $conditionalTest(AND $extra, $extra)
targets.rawQuery: SELECT count() FROM default.flows_raw WHERE 1

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    sum(Packets * SamplingRate) / $interval AS Packets,
    if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
  $conditionalTest(AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6($sampler), $sampler)
  $conditionalTest(AND SrcAddr = toIPv6('$srcIP'), $srcIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND DstAddr = toIPv6('$dstIP'), $dstIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND NextHop = toIPv6('$nextHop'), $nextHop)
  $conditionalTest(AND $extra, $extra)
GROUP BY t, FlowDirection
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(TimeReceived), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,     sum(Packets * SamplingRate) / 1 AS Packets,     if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection FROM default.flows_raw WHERE TimeReceived >= toDateTime(1590609900)                     GROUP BY t, FlowDirection ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / $interval AS Bps,
    if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
  $conditionalTest(AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6($sampler), $sampler)
  $conditionalTest(AND SrcAddr = toIPv6('$srcIP'), $srcIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND DstAddr = toIPv6('$dstIP'), $dstIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND NextHop = toIPv6('$nextHop'), $nextHop)
  $conditionalTest(AND $extra, $extra)
GROUP BY t, FlowDirection
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(TimeReceived), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,     sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / 1 AS Bps,     if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection FROM default.flows_raw WHERE TimeReceived >= toDateTime(1590586091)    AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6('::85.190.150.169')                  GROUP BY t, FlowDirection ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    dictGetString('IPProtocols', 'Name', toUInt64(Proto)) || ' (' || toString(Proto) || ')' AS Proto,
    sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / $interval AS Bps,
    if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
  $conditionalTest(AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6($sampler), $sampler)
  $conditionalTest(AND SrcAddr = toIPv6('$srcIP'), $srcIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND DstAddr = toIPv6('$dstIP'), $dstIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND NextHop = toIPv6('$nextHop'), $nextHop)
  $conditionalTest(AND $extra, $extra)
GROUP BY t, Proto, FlowDirection
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(TimeReceived), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,     dictGetString('IPProtocols', 'Name', toUInt64(Proto)) || ' (' || toString(Proto) || ')' AS Proto,     sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / 1 AS Bps,     if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection FROM default.flows_raw WHERE TimeReceived >= toDateTime(1590607521)                     GROUP BY t, Proto, FlowDirection ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    dictGetString('EtherTypes', 'Name', toUInt64(EType)) || ' (' || hex(EType) || ')' AS EType,
    sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / $interval AS Bps,
    if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
  $conditionalTest(AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6($sampler), $sampler)
  $conditionalTest(AND SrcAddr = toIPv6('$srcIP'), $srcIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND DstAddr = toIPv6('$dstIP'), $dstIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND NextHop = toIPv6('$nextHop'), $nextHop)
  $conditionalTest(AND $extra, $extra)
GROUP BY t, EType, FlowDirection
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(TimeReceived), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,     dictGetString('EtherTypes', 'Name', toUInt64(EType)) || ' (' || hex(EType) || ')' AS EType,     sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / 1 AS Bps,     if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection FROM default.flows_raw WHERE TimeReceived >= toDateTime(1590607639)                     GROUP BY t, EType, FlowDirection ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    count(*) / $interval AS Flows,
    SamplerAddress
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    $conditionalTest(AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6($sampler), $sampler)
    $conditionalTest(AND SrcAddr = toIPv6('$srcIP'), $srcIP)
    $conditionalTest(AND DstAddr = toIPv6('$dstIP'), $dstIP)
    $conditionalTest(AND NextHop = toIPv6('$nextHop'), $nextHop)
    $conditionalTest(AND $extra, $extra)

GROUP BY
    t, SamplerAddress
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(TimeReceived), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,     count(*) / 1 AS Flows,     SamplerAddress FROM default.flows_raw WHERE     TimeReceived >= toDateTime(1590586121)      AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6('::85.190.150.169')                           GROUP BY     t, SamplerAddress ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    NextHop,
    sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / $interval AS Bps
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter AND NextHop != toIPv6('::')
  $conditionalTest(AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6($sampler), $sampler)
  $conditionalTest(AND SrcAddr = toIPv6('$srcIP'), $srcIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND DstAddr = toIPv6('$dstIP'), $dstIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND NextHop = toIPv6('$nextHop'), $nextHop)
  $conditionalTest(AND $extra, $extra)
GROUP BY t, NextHop
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(TimeReceived), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t,     NextHop,     sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / 60 AS Bps FROM default.flows_raw WHERE TimeReceived >= toDateTime(1590510701) AND NextHop != toIPv6('::')                     GROUP BY t, NextHop ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    SamplerAddress,
    InIf,
    sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / $interval AS Bps,
    if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
  $conditionalTest(AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6($sampler), $sampler)
  $conditionalTest(AND SrcAddr = toIPv6('$srcIP'), $srcIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND DstAddr = toIPv6('$dstIP'), $dstIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND NextHop = toIPv6('$nextHop'), $nextHop)
  $conditionalTest(AND $extra, $extra)
GROUP BY t, SamplerAddress, InIf, FlowDirection
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(TimeReceived), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,     SamplerAddress,     InIf,     sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / 1 AS Bps,     if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection FROM default.flows_raw WHERE TimeReceived >= toDateTime(1590586129)    AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6('::85.190.150.169')                  GROUP BY t, SamplerAddress, InIf, FlowDirection ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    SamplerAddress,
    OutIf,
    sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / $interval AS Bps,
    if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
  $conditionalTest(AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6($sampler), $sampler)
  $conditionalTest(AND SrcAddr = toIPv6('$srcIP'), $srcIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND DstAddr = toIPv6('$dstIP'), $dstIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND NextHop = toIPv6('$nextHop'), $nextHop)
  $conditionalTest(AND $extra, $extra)
GROUP BY t, SamplerAddress, OutIf, FlowDirection

targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(TimeReceived), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,     SamplerAddress,     OutIf,     sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / 1 AS Bps,     if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection FROM default.flows_raw WHERE TimeReceived >= toDateTime(1590586137)    AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6('::85.190.150.169')                  GROUP BY t, SamplerAddress, OutIf, FlowDirection ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
  SrcAS,
  sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) / 1024 as Bytes
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter AND FlowDirection = 0
  $conditionalTest(AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6($sampler), $sampler)
  $conditionalTest(AND SrcAddr = toIPv6('$srcIP'), $srcIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND DstAddr = toIPv6('$dstIP'), $dstIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND NextHop = toIPv6('$nextHop'), $nextHop)
  $conditionalTest(AND $extra, $extra)
GROUP BY SrcAS
ORDER BY Bytes DESC
LIMIT 100
targets.rawQuery: SELECT    SrcAS,   sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) / 1024 as Bytes FROM default.flows_raw WHERE TimeReceived >= toDateTime(1590586169) AND FlowDirection = 0    AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6('::85.190.150.169')                  GROUP BY SrcAS ORDER BY Bytes DESC LIMIT 100

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
  DstAS,
  sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) / 1024 as Bytes
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter AND FlowDirection = 1
  $conditionalTest(AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6($sampler), $sampler)
  $conditionalTest(AND SrcAddr = toIPv6('$srcIP'), $srcIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND DstAddr = toIPv6('$dstIP'), $dstIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND NextHop = toIPv6('$nextHop'), $nextHop)
  $conditionalTest(AND $extra, $extra)
GROUP BY DstAS
ORDER BY Bytes DESC
LIMIT 101
targets.rawQuery: SELECT    DstAS,   sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) / 1024 as Bytes FROM default.flows_raw WHERE TimeReceived >= toDateTime(1590586174) AND FlowDirection = 1    AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6('::85.190.150.169')                  GROUP BY DstAS ORDER BY Bytes DESC LIMIT 101

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    SrcAS,
    sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / $interval AS Bps
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    $conditionalTest(AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6($sampler), $sampler)
    $conditionalTest(AND SrcAddr = toIPv6('$srcIP'), $srcIP)
    $conditionalTest(AND DstAddr = toIPv6('$dstIP'), $dstIP)
    $conditionalTest(AND NextHop = toIPv6('$nextHop'), $nextHop)
    AND SrcAS IN (
    SELECT SrcAS
    FROM $table
    WHERE $timeFilter AND FlowDirection = 0
    GROUP BY SrcAS
    ORDER BY count(*) DESC
    LIMIT 10)
    $conditionalTest(AND $extra, $extra)
GROUP BY
    t,
    SrcAS
ORDER BY t, Bps
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(TimeReceived), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,     SrcAS,     sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / 1 AS Bps FROM default.flows_raw WHERE     TimeReceived BETWEEN toDateTime(1590602295) AND toDateTime(1590602669)                             AND SrcAS IN (     SELECT SrcAS     FROM default.flows_raw     WHERE TimeReceived BETWEEN toDateTime(1590602295) AND toDateTime(1590602669) AND FlowDirection = 0     GROUP BY SrcAS     ORDER BY count(*) DESC     LIMIT 10)       GROUP BY     t,     SrcAS ORDER BY t, Bps

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    DstAS,
    sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / $interval AS Bps
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    $conditionalTest(AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6($sampler), $sampler)
    $conditionalTest(AND SrcAddr = toIPv6('$srcIP'), $srcIP)
    $conditionalTest(AND DstAddr = toIPv6('$dstIP'), $dstIP)
    $conditionalTest(AND NextHop = toIPv6('$nextHop'), $nextHop)
    AND DstAS IN (
    SELECT DstAS
    FROM $table
    WHERE $timeFilter AND FlowDirection = 1
    GROUP BY DstAS
    ORDER BY count(*) DESC
    LIMIT 10)
    $conditionalTest(AND $extra, $extra)
GROUP BY
    t,
    DstAS
ORDER BY t, Bps
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(TimeReceived), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,     DstAS,     sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / 1 AS Bps FROM default.flows_raw WHERE     TimeReceived BETWEEN toDateTime(1590589695) AND toDateTime(1590590256)                             AND DstAS IN (     SELECT DstAS     FROM default.flows_raw     WHERE TimeReceived BETWEEN toDateTime(1590589695) AND toDateTime(1590590256) AND FlowDirection = 1     GROUP BY DstAS     ORDER BY count(*) DESC     LIMIT 10)       GROUP BY     t,     DstAS ORDER BY t, Bps

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    
    arrayStringConcat(
      arrayMap(
        x -> dictGetString('TCPFlags', 'Name', toUInt64(x)), bitmaskToArray(TCPFlags))
      , '-')
    || ' (' || toString(TCPFlags) || ')' AS TCPFlags,
    
    sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / $interval AS Bps,
    if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
  $conditionalTest(AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6($sampler), $sampler)
  $conditionalTest(AND SrcAddr = toIPv6('$srcIP'), $srcIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND DstAddr = toIPv6('$dstIP'), $dstIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND NextHop = toIPv6('$nextHop'), $nextHop)
  $conditionalTest(AND $extra, $extra)
GROUP BY t, TCPFlags, FlowDirection
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(TimeReceived), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,          arrayStringConcat(       arrayMap(         x -> dictGetString('TCPFlags', 'Name', toUInt64(x)), bitmaskToArray(TCPFlags))       , '-')     || ' (' || toString(TCPFlags) || ')' AS TCPFlags,          sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / 1 AS Bps,     if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection FROM default.flows_raw WHERE TimeReceived >= toDateTime(1590615246)                     GROUP BY t, TCPFlags, FlowDirection ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    VlanId,
    sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / $interval AS Bps,
    if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
  $conditionalTest(AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6($sampler), $sampler)
  $conditionalTest(AND SrcAddr = toIPv6('$srcIP'), $srcIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND DstAddr = toIPv6('$dstIP'), $dstIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND NextHop = toIPv6('$nextHop'), $nextHop)
  $conditionalTest(AND $extra, $extra)
GROUP BY t, VlanId, FlowDirection
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(TimeReceived), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,     VlanId,     sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / 1 AS Bps,     if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection FROM default.flows_raw WHERE TimeReceived >= toDateTime(1590607741)                     GROUP BY t, VlanId, FlowDirection ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    toString(SrcPort) || '/' || dictGetString('IPProtocols', 'Name', toUInt64(Proto)) AS Proto,
    sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / $interval AS Bps,
    if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    $conditionalTest(AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6($sampler), $sampler)
    $conditionalTest(AND SrcAddr = toIPv6('$srcIP'), $srcIP)
    $conditionalTest(AND DstAddr = toIPv6('$dstIP'), $dstIP)
    $conditionalTest(AND NextHop = toIPv6('$nextHop'), $nextHop)
    AND SrcPort IN (
    SELECT SrcPort
    FROM $table
    WHERE $timeFilter AND $adhoc
    GROUP BY SrcPort
    ORDER BY count(*) DESC
    LIMIT 10)
    $conditionalTest(AND $extra, $extra)
GROUP BY
    t,
    Proto,
    SrcPort, 
    FlowDirection
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(TimeReceived), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,     toString(SrcPort) || '/' || dictGetString('IPProtocols', 'Name', toUInt64(Proto)) AS Proto,     sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / 1 AS Bps,     if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection FROM default.flows_raw WHERE     TimeReceived BETWEEN toDateTime(1590602295) AND toDateTime(1590602669)                             AND SrcPort IN (     SELECT SrcPort     FROM default.flows_raw     WHERE TimeReceived BETWEEN toDateTime(1590602295) AND toDateTime(1590602669) AND 1     GROUP BY SrcPort     ORDER BY count(*) DESC     LIMIT 10)       GROUP BY     t,     Proto,     SrcPort,      FlowDirection ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    toString(DstPort) || '/' || dictGetString('IPProtocols', 'Name', toUInt64(Proto)) AS Proto,
    sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / $interval AS Bps,
    if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    $conditionalTest(AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6($sampler), $sampler)
    $conditionalTest(AND SrcAddr = toIPv6('$srcIP'), $srcIP)
    $conditionalTest(AND DstAddr = toIPv6('$dstIP'), $dstIP)
    $conditionalTest(AND NextHop = toIPv6('$nextHop'), $nextHop)
    AND DstPort IN (
    SELECT DstPort
    FROM $table
    WHERE $timeFilter
    GROUP BY DstPort
    ORDER BY count(*) DESC
    LIMIT 10)
    $conditionalTest(AND $extra, $extra)

GROUP BY
    t,
    Proto,
    DstPort,
    FlowDirection
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(TimeReceived), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,     toString(DstPort) || '/' || dictGetString('IPProtocols', 'Name', toUInt64(Proto)) AS Proto,     sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / 1 AS Bps,     if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection FROM default.flows_raw WHERE     TimeReceived BETWEEN toDateTime(1590602295) AND toDateTime(1590602669)                             AND DstPort IN (     SELECT DstPort     FROM default.flows_raw     WHERE TimeReceived BETWEEN toDateTime(1590602295) AND toDateTime(1590602669)     GROUP BY DstPort     ORDER BY count(*) DESC     LIMIT 10)        GROUP BY     t,     Proto,     DstPort,     FlowDirection ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    SrcAddr,
    sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / $interval AS Bps,
    if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    $conditionalTest(AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6($sampler), $sampler)
    $conditionalTest(AND SrcAddr = toIPv6('$srcIP'), $srcIP)
    $conditionalTest(AND DstAddr = toIPv6('$dstIP'), $dstIP)
    $conditionalTest(AND NextHop = toIPv6('$nextHop'), $nextHop)
    AND SrcAddr IN (
    SELECT SrcAddr
    FROM $table
    WHERE $timeFilter AND $adhoc
    GROUP BY SrcAddr
    ORDER BY sum(Bytes) DESC
    LIMIT 10)
    $conditionalTest(AND $extra, $extra)
GROUP BY
    t,
    SrcAddr, 
    FlowDirection
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(TimeReceived), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,     SrcAddr,     sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / 1 AS Bps,     if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection FROM default.flows_raw WHERE     TimeReceived >= toDateTime(1590614910)                             AND SrcAddr IN (     SELECT SrcAddr     FROM default.flows_raw     WHERE TimeReceived >= toDateTime(1590614910) AND 1     GROUP BY SrcAddr     ORDER BY sum(Bytes) DESC     LIMIT 10)       GROUP BY     t,     SrcAddr,      FlowDirection ORDER BY t

    $timeSeries as t,

targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(TimeReceived), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,     DstAddr,     sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) * 8 / 1 AS Bps,     if(FlowDirection == 1, 'out', 'in') AS FlowDirection FROM default.flows_raw WHERE     TimeReceived >= toDateTime(1590614957)                             AND DstAddr IN (     SELECT DstAddr     FROM default.flows_raw     WHERE TimeReceived >= toDateTime(1590614957) AND 1     GROUP BY DstAddr     ORDER BY sum(Bytes) DESC     LIMIT 10)       GROUP BY     t,     DstAddr,      FlowDirection ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
  SamplerAddress,
  SrcAddr,
  sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) / 1024 as Bytes
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
  $conditionalTest(AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6($sampler), $sampler)
  $conditionalTest(AND SrcAddr = toIPv6('$srcIP'), $srcIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND DstAddr = toIPv6('$dstIP'), $dstIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND NextHop = toIPv6('$nextHop'), $nextHop)
  $conditionalTest(AND $extra, $extra)
GROUP BY SamplerAddress, SrcAddr
ORDER BY Bytes DESC
LIMIT 100
targets.rawQuery: SELECT    SamplerAddress,   SrcAddr,   sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) / 1024 as Bytes FROM default.flows_raw WHERE TimeReceived >= toDateTime(1590586148)    AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6('::85.190.150.169')                  GROUP BY SamplerAddress, SrcAddr ORDER BY Bytes DESC LIMIT 100

targets.rawQuery: SELECT    SamplerAddress,   DstAddr,   sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) / 1024 as Bytes FROM default.flows_raw WHERE TimeReceived >= toDateTime(1590586144)    AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6('::85.190.150.169')                  GROUP BY SamplerAddress, DstAddr ORDER BY Bytes DESC LIMIT 100

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
  SamplerAddress,
  SrcAddr,
  DstAddr,
  SrcPort,
  DstPort,
  dictGetString('IPProtocols', 'Name', toUInt64(Proto)) AS Proto,
  sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) / 1024 as Bytes
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
  $conditionalTest(AND SamplerAddress = toIPv6($sampler), $sampler)
  $conditionalTest(AND SrcAddr = toIPv6('$srcIP'), $srcIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND DstAddr = toIPv6('$dstIP'), $dstIP)
  $conditionalTest(AND NextHop = toIPv6('$nextHop'), $nextHop)
  $conditionalTest(AND $extra, $extra)
GROUP BY SamplerAddress, SrcAddr, DstAddr, SrcPort, DstPort, Proto
ORDER BY Bytes DESC
LIMIT 20
targets.rawQuery: SELECT    SamplerAddress,   SrcAddr,   DstAddr,   SrcPort,   DstPort,   dictGetString('IPProtocols', 'Name', toUInt64(Proto)) AS Proto,   sum(Bytes * SamplingRate) / 1024 as Bytes FROM default.flows_raw WHERE TimeReceived BETWEEN toDateTime(1590602295) AND toDateTime(1590602669)                     GROUP BY SamplerAddress, SrcAddr, DstAddr, SrcPort, DstPort, Proto ORDER BY Bytes DESC LIMIT 20
